name: Conbunn Cardboard
description:
CARDBOARD WALK!

A relaxed platformer to hop around while collecting the lost CDs of Connie, a well-known DJ. Help the bunny to recover them while exploring cardboard and paper environments.

No need to hurry though, take your time and enjoy the island as you prefear!

FEATURES

  • Explore areas like Paint Hills, Cutout Forest or Paper Bay, among others!
  • Unlock skins for the bun with your progress!
  • 40 CDs to collect with unique illustrations!
  • Several Sub-Areas with minigames and platforming challenges!
  • Cute Bunns!

BUN BUN CONBUNN!

Connie is a well-known DJ in Cardbun Island. Her artistic name is Conbunn! Her friend Cell is a bird, and she has lost the "Conbunn Discs" (CDs) that Connie needed before a concert. Collect a good amount of them and reach the top to perform that night session!
